mapper.insert: insert into jt_808_request_trace_log (id, request_id, received_at, net_type, trace_id, terminal_id, message_id, version, flow_id, message_body_length, message_body_property, total_package, current_package_no, is_subpackage, raw_hex, escaped_hex, created_at) values (#{id}, #{requestId}, #{receivedAt}, #{netType}, #{traceId}, #{terminalId}, #{messageId}, #{version}, #{flowId}, #{messageBodyLength}, #{messageBodyProperty}, #{totalPackage}, #{currentPackageNo}, #{isSubpackage}, #{rawHex}, #{escapedHex}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: select count(1) from jt_808_request_trace_log req left join jt_808_response_trace_log res on req.request_id = res.request_id

select req.request_id as requestId, req.terminal_id as terminalId, req.net_type as netType, req.message_id as messageId, req.version as version, req.flow_id as flowId, req.message_body_length as messageBodyLength, req.message_body_property as messageBodyProperty, req.received_at as receivedAt, res.sent_at as sentAt, req.is_subpackage as isSubpackage, req.current_package_no as currentPackageNo, req.total_package as totalPackage, req.raw_hex as requestHex, req.escaped_hex as requestHexEscaped, req.trace_id as traceId, res.escaped_hex as responseHex from jt_808_request_trace_log req left join jt_808_response_trace_log res on req.request_id = res.request_id order by req.received_at desc, current_package_no limit #{dto.size} offset #{dto.offset}
